questions.question: What is the current version of this document?
Who is the approver for this document?
questions.description: Identifies who has authority to approve this process

questions.question: What product or service does this sales process cover?
questions.description: Specifies what is being sold under this workflow

questions.question: When does this sales process become effective?
questions.description: Sets the implementation date for the new process

questions.question: What is your company name?
questions.description: Used throughout the document to personalize the sales workflow

questions.question: What sales roles exist in your organization?
questions.description: Define each role and their main responsibility in the sales process

questions.question: Which departments does this sales process apply to?
questions.description: Identifies which teams must follow this process

questions.question: What activities are out of scope for this process?
questions.description: Clarifies what the sales process does not cover
questions.placeholder: Marketing campaign execution, post-sales customer lifecycle management

questions.question: What KPIs will you track for your sales process?
questions.description: Define the key metrics you'll use to measure sales performance

questions.question: How often should this document be reviewed?
questions.description: Sets the review cycle for keeping the process current

questions.question: Describe your document approval process
questions.description: Defines who reviews and approves updates to this process
questions.placeholder: Document owner reviews quarterly, VP Sales approves changes
